translateItemList.eng: Occupying a Mana Spring gives you +1 bonus Mana for that turn.
Up to 3 Artifacts can be equipped at one time.
Minions will always counterattack, even if they get destroyed.
Use Practice Mode to hone your skills with a new Faction.
Earn rewards for completing Solo Challenges.
You can gain Faction XP up to level 10 in practice mode.
Reach Rank 20 and you'll be rewarded with a Loot Crate containing prizes at the end of the season!
Reach Rank 10 and you'll be rewarded with a new LEGENDARY card at the end of the season.
Every month, rank up in Ranked Ladder to earn better monthly rewards.
Allies can move through each other, but not through enemies.
Bonus chevrons are awarded for each rank achieved at the end of the previous season.
Look at ALL cards in the entire set by enabling Crafting Mode.
You earn +20 Gold for your first Win of the Day.
Card Rarity: COMMON, RARE, EPIC and LEGENDARY.
5 Divisions: BRONZE, SILVER, GOLD, DIAMOND AND S-RANK.
Win Streaks start in SILVER and end in DIAMOND.
Artifacts have 3 durability - damage the wearer 3 times to break them.
Once you enter a new Division, you cannot drop to the previous division for that season.
Playing online matches earn you Faction XP.
Generals cannot surpass 25 health.
Tipping opponents at the end of a match is a great way to show that you enjoyed playing against them.
You can replace each quest once per day.
Your units can move up to 2 spaces.
You can replace one card per turn, every turn.
Replacing a card never returns the same copy of that card.
You can change your username once per month.
The standard movement range for units is 2 spaces.
You do not draw cards at the end of your turn if your action bar is full.
Join a tournament to get exclusive rewards: prestige emotes, ribbons, titles.
The effects of Artifacts cannot be dispelled.
Player 1’s units always face to the right, while Player 2’s units always face to the left.
You gain 1 Mana at the start of your turn, up to max of 9.
You can mute an opponent by clicking on their portrait.
You start with an extra mana crystal as Player 2.
Unlock over a dozen Hidden Achievements as you play more matches.
You earn a Faction Ribbon for every 100 wins with that faction.
Watch your own replays in your Profile Match History.
The Battle Log shows you all previous card plays during your match.
Actions consist of movements followed by attacks, you cannot attack and then move.
Consider replacing at the START of your turn to expand your strategic options.
Minions with AIRDROP can be summoned anywhere on the battlefield.
Minions with BLAST deal damage to all enemies in a straight line.
Minions with CELERITY can be activated TWICE per turn.
Minions with DEATHWATCH trigger whenever ANY minion dies.
Minions with DYING WISH trigger AFTER they're destroyed.
Minions with FLYING can move anywhere on the battlefield.
Minions with FRENZY can hit all nearby enemies simultaneously.
Minions with PROVOKE force nearby enemies to attack them first.
Minions with REBIRTH leave behind an egg that hatches before your next turn.
Minions with RUSH are activated right upon entering play.
Minions with GROW will gain stats at the beginning of your turn.
Reach Rank 10 and you'll be rewarded with a new LEGENDARY card at the end of the season.
Consider replacing at the START of your turn to expand your strategic options.
ZEAL minions need to be near your General to maximize their potential.
Minions with OPENING GAMBIT trigger right BEFORE they enter play.
Wall Minions disappear when dispelled.
BLAST minions will receive counterattacks from RANGED minions.
Dervishes summoned by your Obelysks disappear at the end of your turn.
Effects that only target minions will not apply to Generals.
Minions with FRENZY are only counterattacked by their attack target.
Minions with INFILTRATE gain a bonus while on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
Star's Fury won't summon Dervishes on spaces that are already occupied.
Dispelling a STUNNED minion will remove STUN, allowing it to move and attack.
Transforming units does not activate REBIRTH or DYING WISH.
Use your allies to block movement of your enemies.
Your minions lose the ZEAL buff when they're not adjacent to your General.
